thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Moody's sees limited impact of US tariffs on Chinese exports, economy

title: Moody's sees limited impact of US tariffs on Chinese exports, economy
text:
April 11, 2018 / 4:21 AM / Updated an hour ago Moody's sees limited impact of US tariffs on Chinese exports, economy Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 11 (Reuters) - Moody’s Investors Service said on Wednesday the direct impact of the proposed U.S. tariffs on China’s exports and economy will be limited but the “knock-on effects” are expected to be wider. 
The global ratings agency said it expects the U.S. and China will prevent a "significant escalation" in their trade dispute going by the negative impact the restrictions will have on both economies. bit.ly/2GOXerr (Reporting by Kanishka Singh in Bengaluru; Editing by Gopakumar Warrier)
